Html: How can I format my exported xlsx Bold top of heading PHPExcel 1.8 heading format Bold xlsx <i use PHPExcel 1.8 01simple-download-xlsx.php>

Say that your header is contained in cells A1:F1 on the active worksheet.
$objPHPExcel->getActiveSheet()->getStyle('A1:F1')->getFont()->setBold(true);
LWol ! Thanks Your Quick Response , It works fine
